text: Cavalera Conspiracy is an American heavy metal band formed in 2007. ==Discography== ;Studio albums * Inflikted (2008) * Blunt Force Trauma (2011) * Pandemonium (2014) ==References== Category:2007 establishments in the United States Category:2000s American music groups Category:2010s American music groups Category:American heavy metal bands Category:Death metal bands Category:Groove metal bands Category:Thrash metal bands Category:Musical groups established in 2007 Category:Musical groups from Arizona Category:Phoenix, Arizona Category:2000s establishments in Arizona
